description: Pure white. Use for: light theme backgrounds, text on dark backgrounds, card surfaces. Contrast ratio with black: 21:1 (WCAG AAA). Avoid using directly - prefer semantic tokens like color.body or color.default.
Pure black. Use for: dark theme text emphasis, high-contrast borders. Contrast ratio with white: 21:1 (WCAG AAA). Rarely used directly - prefer dark.9 for softer blacks or semantic color.text token.
Fully transparent. Use for: invisible interactive areas, overlay starting states, clearfix backgrounds. CSS keyword value - works in all color contexts.
